Plot: This candid New York love story explores the chaotic 40-year marriage of famed boxing painter Ushio Shinohara and his wife, Noriko. Anxious to shed her role as her overbearing husband's assistant, Noriko finds an identity of her own.
Title: Cutie and the Boxer
Actors: Noriko Shinohara, Ushio Shinohara, Alex Shinohara, Ethan Cohen
tomatoConsensus: A beautifully-made documentary that explores the challenges and richness of both marriage and art through the lens of a fascinating and complex couple.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 12 nominations.
